text: Péter Tóvári (born 31 October 1951) is a Hungarian rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Hungary Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Győr
title: Péter Tóvári
